articles.title: Book on DIU Published in Democratic Congo
articles.content:
Book on DIU Published in Democratic Congo 
   Pyongyang, November 28 (KCNA) -- Book "80 Years of Struggle to Carry forward Tradition of 'Down-with-Imperialism Union'" written by Otete Gaston Mboyo, chairman of the National Committee of the Genuine Lumumbist Patriotic Party of Democratic Congo who is also chairman of the Democratic Congo-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Association, was brought about by the Congo New Media Publishing House of Democratic Congo on Nov. 20.
 Noting that the revolutionary history of President Kim Il Sung teaches genuine truth to people, the writer said that the name of the "Down-with-Imperialism Union (DIU)" formed by the President reflected his clairvoyant wisdom.    
 The writer said that Kim Jong Il has translated the idea of the DIU into a brilliant reality, expressing the belief that the book would serve as a good reference book for the African people in their struggle.

Greetings to Chief of Palestinian National Authority
articles.content:
Greetings to Chief of Palestinian National Authority
   Pyongyang, November 28 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Tuesday sent a message of greetings to Mahmoud Abbas, chairman of the Executive Committee of the Palestine Liberation Organization and chief of the Palestinian National Authority, on the occasion of the "world day of solidarity with the Palestinian people".
 The message noted that the Palestinian people have waged unflinching struggle to foil Israel's reckless moves for permanent occupation and for an unbiased solution to the Palestinian issue.    
 Reiterating firm solidarity to the chairman and the Palestinian people in their struggle to retake legitimate national right including the right to self-determination, the right to return home and the right to establish an independent state with Kuds as capital, the message reconfirmed the invariable stand of the DPRK government and people toward the just cause of the Palestinian people.

articles.title: Greetings to Albanian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Albanian President
   Pyongyang, November 28 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Tuesday sent a message of greetings to Alfred Moisiu, president of the Republic of Albania, on the occasion of its national day.
 Expressing the belief that the relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would favorably develop in the mutual interests, the message sincerely wished the Albanian president success in his work for the country's prosperity.

articles.title: Credentials to Kim Yong Nam
articles.content:
Credentials to Kim Yong Nam
   Pyongyang, November 28 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, was presented with credentials by Daulat Hotma Audison Passaribu, Indonesian ambassador e. p to the DPRK at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Tuesday.
 Present there were Vice-minister of Foreign Affairs Kim Yong Il and the members of the embassy here.    
 After receiving the credentials, Kim Yong Nam had a talk with the ambassador.

articles.title: Mun Jae Dok and DPRK Team Leave
articles.content:
Mun Jae Dok and DPRK Team Leave
   Pyongyang, November 28 (KCNA) -- Chairman of the Korean Physical Culture and Sports Guidance Commission Mun Jae Dok who is chairman of the Olympic Committee of the DPRK and the DPRK team left here today to participate in the 15th Asian Games in Qatar.
